*Remember to use good programming practices; documentation, error-checking, understandable variable names
AND go through DataTypes.RMD
```{r}
w <- ricker(A0=5,
            J0=5,
            u=.2,
            y0=20,
            a=5,
            b=5,
            c11=0.1,
            c22=0.1,
            c12=0.11,
            c21=0.12)

```

```{r}

ricker_outcome(w)


```
